array.string: Locate perl and python modules using relative-paths
Locate git subcommand executables relative to runtime executable
Use symbolic links rather than hard links for files in libexec
HTML documentation is not provided with Apple's git. Make the error message more on point.
Set Apple Git version during build
Fix detection of UTF8_NFD_TO_NFC in test-lib
git-svn had a minor thinko/typo which has been fixed.
